overview: School is in session, and Gracie Glam, Molly Bennett, Brooke Lee Adams, Roxanne Rae, Tiffany Star, and many more of the hottest schoolgirls can't wait to get their pussies smashed by a fat cock! There's 3 discs and over 9 hrs. 20 mins. of nonstop cramming action, so join these naughty schoolgirls as they get schooled in today's lesson -- hardcore fucking 101!
title: The Twenty: The Schoolgirls
